analyzed: thal byung zhabs su song zhing de yang mchil ma mdog sna tshogs su 'byung na zla ba gcig gi nang du srog 'dor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and if they sink to the bottom and spread out, and if the saliva has various colors, one will lose one’s life within a month.

original: skyes bu gang gis sa ni nam mkhar mthong la nam mkha' ni sar mthong ba dang / gzugs can ni gzugs med par mthong la gzugs med pa ni gzugs can du mthong @83a */
analyzed: skyes bu gang gis sa ni nam mkhar mthong la nam mkha' ni sar mthong ba dang / gzugs can ni gzugs med par mthong la gzugs med pa ni gzugs can du mthong @83a */
translated: If a person sees earth as space and space as earth, and if one sees the formless as having form and the formless as formless,

original: ba dang / me la sogs pa'i 'od ni 'od med par mthong ba dang ; mdog dkar po ni nag por mthong la /
analyzed: ba dang / me la sogs pa'i 'od ni 'od med par mthong ba dang ; mdog dkar po ni nag por mthong la /
translated: and if one sees the light of fire and so on as without light, and if one sees white as black,🔽and if one sees the sky as the earth, and if one sees the earth as the sky,

original: nag po ni dkar por mthong ba dang / med pa ni yod par mthong la yod pa ni med par mthong ba dang / mig nad med bzhin du zla ba'i gzugs mang po mthong zhing de nyid kyang mtshan dang bral bar mthong ba dang / gang gi rtsa ljang gur 'dug cing ba spu'i khung bu'i rtsa ba yang ljang gur 'dug pa dang /
analyzed: nag po ni dkar por mthong ba dang / med pa ni yod par mthong la yod pa ni med par mthong ba dang / mig nad med bzhin du zla ba'i gzugs mang po mthong zhing de nyid kyang mtshan dang bral bar mthong ba dang / gang gi rtsa ljang gur 'dug cing ba spu'i khung bu'i rtsa ba yang ljang gur 'dug pa dang /
translated: One whose veins are green and the roots of the pores are also green,

original: gang skyur ba la dga' ba ni mkhris pa'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed do //
analyzed: gang skyur ba la dga' ba ni mkhris pa'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed do //
translated: and one who delights in sour tastes, will die from a bile disease.

original: mgo bo 'am gdong la ba lang gi lci ba stug pos khebs pa ltar snang na zla ba gcig gis 'chi bar byed do //
analyzed: mgo bo 'am gdong la ba lang gi lci ba stug pos khebs pa ltar snang na zla ba gcig gis 'chi bar byed do //
translated: If the head or face appears as if covered with thick cow dung, one will die in one month.

original: gnyid ma log bzhin du srin po dang / dri za dang / yi dags dang / de bzhin du grub pa dang / ma grub pa dang / sha za la sogs pa mi sdug cing 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs sna tshogs mthong na srog dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyid ma log bzhin du srin po dang / dri za dang / yi dags dang / de bzhin du grub pa dang / ma grub pa dang / sha za la sogs pa mi sdug cing 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs sna tshogs mthong na srog dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one sees various ugly and terrifying forms of rākṣasas, gandharvas, pretas, and likewise siddhas, non-siddhas, piśācas, and so forth, while not asleep, one will lose one's life.

original: skar ma sme bdun mthong la srog skar lha mo sgrib byed ma mthong ba dang / nam mkha' mthong la dgu tshigs ma mthong ba dang / nam mkha' la skar ma gung tshugs ma mthong na lo gcig tshun chad kyis nges par 'chi'o //
analyzed: skar ma sme bdun mthong la srog skar lha mo sgrib byed ma mthong ba dang / nam mkha' mthong la dgu tshigs ma mthong ba dang / nam mkha' la skar ma gung tshugs ma mthong na lo gcig tshun chad kyis nges par 'chi'o //
translated: If one sees the seven stars of the face but not the life star, the goddess of the life star, or the obscuring one, if one sees the sky but not the constellations, or if one sees the sky but not the stars in conjunction, one will certainly die within a year.

original: 'brug gi sgra dang // chu'i sgra dang / pi wang gi sgra dang / gling bu dang / rnga bo che'i sgra dang ; 'di rnams kyi sgra yang dag pa ni ma thos pa dang / de bzhin du med ba thos na 'chi bar 'gyur ro /
analyzed: 'brug gi sgra dang // chu'i sgra dang / pi wang gi sgra dang / gling bu dang / rnga bo che'i sgra dang ; 'di rnams kyi sgra yang dag pa ni ma thos pa dang / de bzhin du med ba thos na 'chi bar 'gyur ro /
translated: If one does not hear the sounds of thunder, water, lute, flute, or great drum, or if one hears these sounds as nonexistent, one will die.

original: rna ba'i bu ga mdzub mos bkab pa dang chu'i sgra bzhin du 'ur 'ur zer ba yod de /
analyzed: rna ba'i bu ga mdzub mos bkab pa dang chu'i sgra bzhin du 'ur 'ur zer ba yod de /
translated: If one covers one’s ear holes with one’s fingers and hears a sound like the sound of water,

original: de rang gis ma thos na 'chi'o //
analyzed: de rang gis ma thos na 'chi'o //
translated: if one does not hear it oneself, one will die.

original: de bzhin du dri dang / ro dang / reg la sogs pa phyin ci log tu mthong ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dri dang / ro dang / reg la sogs pa phyin ci log tu mthong ba ste /
translated: Similarly, one sees smells, tastes, and textures in a distorted way.

original: dri zhim pa ni nga bar tshor la dri nga ba ni zhim par tshor ba dang / ro yang mngar ba ni tsha bar shes tsha ba ni mngar ba yin no zhes zer ba dang / reg pa 'jam po ni rtsub pa zhes zer /
analyzed: dri zhim pa ni nga bar tshor la dri nga ba ni zhim par tshor ba dang / ro yang mngar ba ni tsha bar shes tsha ba ni mngar ba yin no zhes zer ba dang / reg pa 'jam po ni rtsub pa zhes zer /
translated: The soft touches are perceived as rough and the rough as soft.

original: rtsub pa ni 'jam pa dang / de bzhin du sra ba dang / snyi ba dang / grang ba dang ; dro ba dang / snum pa la sogs pa phyin ci log tu smra ba dang / shes pa ni srog gi dbang po 'das zin pa yin no //
analyzed: rtsub pa ni 'jam pa dang / de bzhin du sra ba dang / snyi ba dang / grang ba dang ; dro ba dang / snum pa la sogs pa phyin ci log tu smra ba dang / shes pa ni srog gi dbang po 'das zin pa yin no //
translated: The same is true for the other sense objects, such as the hard, the soft, the cold, the hot, the oily, etc.

original: yang na grong gi dri la sogs pa bzang ngan gang yang rung ba mi tshor na de yang nges par 'chi'o //
analyzed: yang na grong gi dri la sogs pa bzang ngan gang yang rung ba mi tshor na de yang nges par 'chi'o //
translated: If one does not perceive the good or bad smells of the town, etc., one will certainly die.

original: me mar shi ba'i dri snas mi tshor na yang 'chi'o //
analyzed: me mar shi ba'i dri snas mi tshor na yang 'chi'o //
translated: If one does not smell the smell of a dying lamp, one will die.

original: sman dpyad @83b gzhung dang mthun par byas na yang des phyir zhing thu bar byed la sman dpyad log par byas na rung ba ltar byed pa yang 'chi ba'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: sman dpyad @83b gzhung dang mthun par byas na yang des phyir zhing thu bar byed la sman dpyad log par byas na rung ba ltar byed pa yang 'chi ba'i rgyu'o //
translated: If one’s health worsens despite proper medical treatment, and improves with improper treatment, this is a cause of death.

original: gang gi lus rdul gyis g-yogs pa dang / lus la mtshon la sogs pas bsnun na yang mi tshor na yang 'chi ba'i rtags su ston pa yin no //🔽dka' thub drag po dang / cho ga dang rnal 'byor grub pa'i rgyu sngon chad ma bsten par dbang po'i yul las 'das pa'i chos khyad par can shes pa 'am /
analyzed: gang gi lus rdul gyis g-yogs pa dang / lus la mtshon la sogs pas bsnun na yang mi tshor na yang 'chi ba'i rtags su ston pa yin no // dka' thub drag po dang / cho ga dang rnal 'byor grub pa'i rgyu sngon chad ma bsten par dbang po'i yul las 'das pa'i chos khyad par can shes pa 'am /
translated: If one's body is covered with dust, or if one's body is struck with a weapon, etc., but one does not feel it, this is also a sign of death.

original: mthong ba 'am /
analyzed: mthong ba 'am /
translated: If one has not previously practiced austerities, rituals, or the causes of the accomplishment of yoga, but one knows, sees, or speaks of special dharmas that transcend the objects of the senses,

original: smra ba yang 'chi ba'i rtags so //
analyzed: smra ba yang 'chi ba'i rtags so //
translated: this is also a sign of death.

original: gnyug ma'i skad chung ba las che bar gyur pa dang / bar bar du smra 'dod pa la dran pa mi gsal te smra mi nus pa dang / skad 'dzer ba dang / skad nyam chung ba dang / gzi mdangs dang stobs bri ba dang /
analyzed: gnyug ma'i skad chung ba las che bar gyur pa dang / bar bar du smra 'dod pa la dran pa mi gsal te smra mi nus pa dang / skad 'dzer ba dang / skad nyam chung ba dang / gzi mdangs dang stobs bri ba dang /
translated: If one's natural voice is small but becomes large, or if one sometimes desires to speak but cannot due to unclear memory, or if one's voice is hoarse, weak, or lusterless, and one's strength diminishes,

original: zas dang spyod lam tshul bzhin du bsten kyang nad 'phel bar byed na ni de yang 'chi ba dang nye ba yin no //
analyzed: zas dang spyod lam tshul bzhin du bsten kyang nad 'phel bar byed na ni de yang 'chi ba dang nye ba yin no //
translated: and if one's illness increases even when one relies on proper diet and conduct, then that is also close to death.

original: rang bzhin gyis skad dang bral ba dang / nga ni 'chi'o zhes skad ngan 'don pa dang / khyod shi'o bya ba'i sgra thos pa de ni 'chi bar 'gyur bas ring du spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis skad dang bral ba dang / nga ni 'chi'o zhes skad ngan 'don pa dang / khyod shi'o bya ba'i sgra thos pa de ni 'chi bar 'gyur bas ring du spang bar bya'o //
translated: The natural voice is lost, and one cries out, “I am dying!”

original: lus kyi dbyibs kyi rnam pa dang / chu zheng la sogs pa'i tshad dang / dkar nag la sogs pa'i mdog dang / gzi mdangs la sogs pa'i grib ma 'am /
analyzed: lus kyi dbyibs kyi rnam pa dang / chu zheng la sogs pa'i tshad dang / dkar nag la sogs pa'i mdog dang / gzi mdangs la sogs pa'i grib ma 'am /
translated: The shape of the body, the size of the body’s width and height, the color of the body, such as white or black, the shadow of the body, such as its radiance,

original: gzugs brnyan rang bzhin las 'gyur te gzhan du mthong na tha na rmi lam gyi nang du snang ba yang 'chi ba yin te /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan rang bzhin las 'gyur te gzhan du mthong na tha na rmi lam gyi nang du snang ba yang 'chi ba yin te /
translated: or the reflection of the body, which is seen as different from its nature, are all signs of death, even if they appear in a dream.

original: de yang nyi ma dang / chu dang / me long gi nang du lus dbyibs dang chu zheng gi tshad snang ba ni grib ma zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de yang nyi ma dang / chu dang / me long gi nang du lus dbyibs dang chu zheng gi tshad snang ba ni grib ma zhes bya ste /
translated: The shape and size of the body that appears in the sun, in water, or in a mirror is called a “shadow.”

original: de yang grib ma chad par snang ba dang / dum bur snang ba dang / mgo med par snang ba dang / chen por snang ba dang / mi sdug par snang ba dang / mgo gnyis par snang ba dang / ya yor snang ba dang /
analyzed: de yang grib ma chad par snang ba dang / dum bur snang ba dang / mgo med par snang ba dang / chen por snang ba dang / mi sdug par snang ba dang / mgo gnyis par snang ba dang / ya yor snang ba dang /
translated: Furthermore, if the reflection appears as if cut off, as if in pieces, as if headless, as if huge, as if ugly, as if double-headed, as if a corpse,

original: de la sogs pa bdag gi lus dud 'gro'i gzugs gang yang rung bar nyi ma la sogs pa'i nang du snang na /
analyzed: de la sogs pa bdag gi lus dud 'gro'i gzugs gang yang rung bar nyi ma la sogs pa'i nang du snang na /
translated: or if the body appears as any other animal form, such as a sun, and so on,

original: skyes bu de ni tshe rdzogs pa yin par rig par bya'o ;
analyzed: skyes bu de ni tshe rdzogs pa yin par rig par bya'o ;
translated: then that person should be known to have completed his life.

original: / de ltar mi snang na ni 'chi ba'i mtshan ma ma yin no //
analyzed: / de ltar mi snang na ni 'chi ba'i mtshan ma ma yin no //
translated: If it does not appear in this way, it is not a sign of death.

original: nad pa'i mig gzhan gyi mig la bltar bcug ste /
analyzed: nad pa'i mig gzhan gyi mig la bltar bcug ste /
translated: The eyes of the sick person should be made to look into the eyes of another person.

original: rang gi gzugs brnyan de'i nang du ma mthong na tshe zad par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi gzugs brnyan de'i nang du ma mthong na tshe zad par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: If the reflection of his own body is not seen within those eyes, he should understand that his life is exhausted.

original: mdog dang gzi brjid ni lus nyid la bltar snang ba ste /
analyzed: mdog dang gzi brjid ni lus nyid la bltar snang ba ste /
translated: The complexion and radiance are seen in the body itself.

original: de yang lus la nam @84a * //
analyzed: de yang lus la nam @84a * //
translated: Moreover, if the complexion and radiance are not seen in the body,

original: mkha' la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po lnga'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid la sogs par brtag pa ni de las nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ni dri ma med pa dang mdog sngo ba snum zhing mdangs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po lnga'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid la sogs par brtag pa ni de las nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ni dri ma med pa dang mdog sngo ba snum zhing mdangs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The examination of the nature, characteristics, etc. of the five great elements such as space is as follows: The characteristic of space is that it is immaculate, blue, oily, and shiny.

original: rlung gi mtshan nyid ni rdul gyis g-yogs pa dang / mdog dmar skyar 'dug pa dang / smug nag dang / thal skyar 'dug pa dang / mdangs nyams pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi mtshan nyid ni rdul gyis g-yogs pa dang / mdog dmar skyar 'dug pa dang / smug nag dang / thal skyar 'dug pa dang / mdangs nyams pa'o //
translated: The characteristic of wind is that it is covered with dust, reddish-brown, dark brown, or pale, and lacks luster.

original: me'i mtshan nyid ni mdog shin tu dmar ba dang / gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / mthong na dga' ba'o //
analyzed: me'i mtshan nyid ni mdog shin tu dmar ba dang / gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / mthong na dga' ba'o //
translated: The characteristic of fire is that it is very red, has brilliance, and is pleasant to behold.

original: chu'i mtshan nyid ni bee d'urya'i mdog ltar sngo ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / mdog shin tu snum pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i mtshan nyid ni bee d'urya'i mdog ltar sngo ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / mdog shin tu snum pa'o //
translated: The characteristic of water is that it is blue like the color of beryl, immaculate, and very shiny.

original: sa'i mtshan nyid ni brtan pa dang / snum pa dang / lus sha rgyas pa dang / dag pa dang / smug nag tu 'dug pa dang dkar ba'o //
analyzed: sa'i mtshan nyid ni brtan pa dang / snum pa dang / lus sha rgyas pa dang / dag pa dang / smug nag tu 'dug pa dang dkar ba'o //
translated: The characteristic of earth is that it is stable, oily, has a fleshy body, is pure, dark brown, and white.

original: lnga po de dag las rlung gi mtshan nyid dang ldan na ni nad dang nyon mongs pa dang / mi bde ba dang / 'chi ba yang ston to //
analyzed: lnga po de dag las rlung gi mtshan nyid dang ldan na ni nad dang nyon mongs pa dang / mi bde ba dang / 'chi ba yang ston to //
translated: If the five elements are endowed with the characteristics of wind, they indicate disease, affliction, discomfort, and death.

original: lhag ma dang ldan na ni bde ba skyed par byed do //
analyzed: lhag ma dang ldan na ni bde ba skyed par byed do //
translated: If endowed with the remainder, they generate happiness.

original: gong du smos pa'i me'i mtshan nyid ni gzhan pas khyad par rnam pa bdun dang ldan te /
analyzed: gong du smos pa'i me'i mtshan nyid ni gzhan pas khyad par rnam pa bdun dang ldan te /
translated: The characteristics of fire mentioned above are endowed with seven distinctions from others:

original: dmar ba dang / ser ba dang / dkar ba dang / smug nag dang / sngo ba dang / skya bseng dang / nag po'o //
analyzed: dmar ba dang / ser ba dang / dkar ba dang / smug nag dang / sngo ba dang / skya bseng dang / nag po'o //
translated: red, yellow, white, dark blue, blue, pale yellow, and black.

original: 'byung ba lnga dang / me'i mtshan nyid bdun po re re la yang snum pa dang / dri ma med pa dang bcas na ni khyad par du bde ba skyed do //
analyzed: 'byung ba lnga dang / me'i mtshan nyid bdun po re re la yang snum pa dang / dri ma med pa dang bcas na ni khyad par du bde ba skyed do //
translated: Each of the five elements and the seven characteristics of fire, if accompanied by oiliness and purity, generate happiness in particular.

original: rtsub pa dang dri ma can dang bcas na ni sdug bsngal skyed par byed do //
analyzed: rtsub pa dang dri ma can dang bcas na ni sdug bsngal skyed par byed do //
translated: If accompanied by roughness and impurity, they generate suffering.

original: mdog dang mdangs gnyis la khyad par du bltab ni mdog ni snu ma pa dang nag pa sogs ma yin la mdangs ni lus kyi gzi byin yin te lus kyi mdog gsal bar byed pa'o /
analyzed: mdog dang mdangs gnyis la khyad par du bltab ni mdog ni snu ma pa dang nag pa sogs ma yin la mdangs ni lus kyi gzi byin yin te lus kyi mdog gsal bar byed pa'o /
translated: The difference between color and radiance is that color is not white, black, and so on, but radiance is the bodily splendor, which illuminates the bodily color.

original: de la grib ma dang gzi mdangs gnyis dang mi ldan pa'i sems can ni gang yang med de khyad pa rdu mi rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma yang grib ma dang gzi mdangs kyis ston pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de la grib ma dang gzi mdangs gnyis dang mi ldan pa'i sems can ni gang yang med de khyad pa rdu mi rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma yang grib ma dang gzi mdangs kyis ston pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that there is no sentient being whatsoever who is not endowed with both shadow and radiance, and that the signs of virtue and nonvirtue of humans are indicated by shadow and radiance.

original: gzhan yang rkang pa gnyis nyed pa dang / rkang pa sa la 'phre ba dang / rkang pa g-yo ba ni 'chi bdag gi dbang du song ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang rkang pa gnyis nyed pa dang / rkang pa sa la 'phre ba dang / rkang pa g-yo ba ni 'chi bdag gi dbang du song ba'o //
translated: Moreover, sinking of the two feet, sticking of the feet to the ground, and trembling of the feet are being under the power of the Lord of Death.

original: kha zas mang du zos kyang nyams stobs bri ba dang / ma zos kyang nyams stobs skye ba 'am /
analyzed: kha zas mang du zos kyang nyams stobs bri ba dang / ma zos kyang nyams stobs skye ba 'am /
translated: Even if one eats a lot of food, one's strength decreases, and if one does not eat, one's strength increases.

original: kha zas mang du zos kyang bshad gci nyung ba dang / ma zos kyang mang ba @84b dang ; kha zas nyung du zos kyang bad kan gyis nyam thag pa dang / dbugs ring du 'thon cing 'gengs la 'dud pa ltar byed pa dang / dang po dbugs ring po 'thon pa las mjug tu dbugs thung du rtseg thabs su byung ste gdung ba ltar shugs 'byin pa dang /
analyzed: kha zas mang du zos kyang bshad gci nyung ba dang / ma zos kyang mang ba @84b dang ; kha zas nyung du zos kyang bad kan gyis nyam thag pa dang / dbugs ring du 'thon cing 'gengs la 'dud pa ltar byed pa dang / dang po dbugs ring po 'thon pa las mjug tu dbugs thung du rtseg thabs su byung ste gdung ba ltar shugs 'byin pa dang /
translated: At first, they exhale a long breath, and then they exhale a short breath, as if they were exhausted.🔽They exhale a short breath, and they tremble as if they were struck to the quick.🔽Their ribs cave in, and it is very difficult for them to move their heads.🔽Their foreheads are covered with sweat, as if they were crying.

original: dbugs thung du 'byin cing gnad du bsnun pa ltar shin tu 'dar ba dang / rtse'u chung 'khums te mgo shin tu bsgul dka' ba dang / dpral ba la rdul mang po mchi ma'i rgyun bzhin du 'byung ba dang / ltu tshigs bye ste rkang lag 'chal ba dang /
analyzed: dbugs thung du 'byin cing gnad du bsnun pa ltar shin tu 'dar ba dang / rtse'u chung 'khums te mgo shin tu bsgul dka' ba dang / dpral ba la rdul mang po mchi ma'i rgyun bzhin du 'byung ba dang / ltu tshigs bye ste rkang lag 'chal ba dang /
translated: Their joints separate, and their arms and legs become flaccid.

original: nyams stobs che yang rung /
analyzed: nyams stobs che yang rung /
translated: Even if they are strong,

original: chung yang rung ldang ba'i tshe dran pa nyams shing 'gyel pa dang / gan rkyal du nyal zhing rkang pa yang dang yang brkyang bskum byed pa dang / rtsig pa dang mal cha la sogs pa la lag pa 'brud pa dang / dgod pa'i rgyu med par dgod pa dang /
analyzed: chung yang rung ldang ba'i tshe dran pa nyams shing 'gyel pa dang / gan rkyal du nyal zhing rkang pa yang dang yang brkyang bskum byed pa dang / rtsig pa dang mal cha la sogs pa la lag pa 'brud pa dang / dgod pa'i rgyu med par dgod pa dang /
translated: you drag your hands on the wall, bed, and so forth, and you laugh without a cause for laughter.🔽You are without cause for grief, but you grieve,🔽you repeatedly lick your lips and teeth with your tongue,🔽you experience and suck on your upper lip with your tongue, you repeatedly snap your fingers,

original: rgyu med par mya ngan byed pa dang / mchu dang so la lces yang dang yang du bldags pa dang / lces ya mchu bldag cing myong bar byed la rkan yang dang yang gtogs pa dang / lus mdog nag po dang / ser po dang /
analyzed: rgyu med par mya ngan byed pa dang / mchu dang so la lces yang dang yang du bldags pa dang / lces ya mchu bldag cing myong bar byed la rkan yang dang yang gtogs pa dang / lus mdog nag po dang / ser po dang /
translated: your body color repeatedly changes to black, yellow,🔽reddish brown, and so forth,

original: dmar skya la sogs par yang dang yang 'gyur ba dang / sman pa dang / zas dang / sman dang / btung ba dang / bla ma dang / bshes gnyen rnams la zhe sdang skyes pa ni 'chi bdag gi dbang du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: dmar skya la sogs par yang dang yang 'gyur ba dang / sman pa dang / zas dang / sman dang / btung ba dang / bla ma dang / bshes gnyen rnams la zhe sdang skyes pa ni 'chi bdag gi dbang du gyur pa yin no //
translated: and you give rise to hatred toward doctors, food, medicine, drink, gurus, and friends.

original: skyes bu gang me'i drod chung ba dang / sems mal gcig na mi gnas pa dang / mdog 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu mya ngan gyis sems gdung ba ni mi 'tsho'o //
analyzed: skyes bu gang me'i drod chung ba dang / sems mal gcig na mi gnas pa dang / mdog 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu mya ngan gyis sems gdung ba ni mi 'tsho'o //
translated: A person who has little heat, whose mind does not stay in one place, whose complexion changes, and who is always tormented by sorrow, will not live.

original: nad pa'i sngon du bsngos pa'i zas dang / gtor ma bya rog gis mi 'dod pa dang / bcud kyis len la sogs pa'i gzhi med par blo bur du mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / lus sha rgyas pa dang / gzi byin dang mdangs dang ldan zhing mdzes pa dang /
analyzed: nad pa'i sngon du bsngos pa'i zas dang / gtor ma bya rog gis mi 'dod pa dang / bcud kyis len la sogs pa'i gzhi med par blo bur du mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / lus sha rgyas pa dang / gzi byin dang mdangs dang ldan zhing mdzes pa dang /
translated: The food that is offered to the sick, the sacrificial cake that is not desired by the crow, the sudden acquisition of knowledge without a basis in the past, the swelling of the body with flesh, the possession of splendor, radiance, and beauty,

original: dpal thob par byed pa dang / gal te sngar thob pa las nyams pa de ni gshin rje'i khyim du 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: dpal thob par byed pa dang / gal te sngar thob pa las nyams pa de ni gshin rje'i khyim du 'jug pa yin no //
translated: and the attainment of glory—if one loses what was previously attained, that is entering the house of Yama.

original: skyes bu gang la skyon gyi rnam pa rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gsum dang / yon tan gyi rnam pa rdul dang / mun pa dang / snying stobs gsum @85a * //
analyzed: skyes bu gang la skyon gyi rnam pa rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gsum dang / yon tan gyi rnam pa rdul dang / mun pa dang / snying stobs gsum @85a * //
translated: A person who has the nature of the three faults—wind, bile, and phlegm—and the three qualities—rajas, tamas, and sattva—,

original: gyi rang bzhin yod pa las gzhan du gyur na /
analyzed: gyi rang bzhin yod pa las gzhan du gyur na /
translated: if they become different,

original: de ni na yang rung min yang rung ste de ni nges par zla ba drug gis 'chi bar bstan to //
analyzed: de ni na yang rung min yang rung ste de ni nges par zla ba drug gis 'chi bar bstan to //
translated: Whether sick or not, it is taught that he will certainly die after six months.

original: gang la gus pa dang / tshul khrims dang / dran pa dang / gtong ba dang / blo dang / stobs 'di rnams sngar yod pa las rgyu med par ldog par byed na zla ba drug gis 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang la gus pa dang / tshul khrims dang / dran pa dang / gtong ba dang / blo dang / stobs 'di rnams sngar yod pa las rgyu med par ldog par byed na zla ba drug gis 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If these five qualities—respect, morality, mindfulness, generosity, and intelligence—which were previously present, disappear without cause, he will die after six months.

original: skyes bu gang chang gis myos pa ltar 'gro ba dang / tshig 'dar zhing rmongs pa de yang tshe zad pa yin no //
analyzed: skyes bu gang chang gis myos pa ltar 'gro ba dang / tshig 'dar zhing rmongs pa de yang tshe zad pa yin no //
translated: If a person walks as if intoxicated by alcohol, stammers, and is confused, his life is coming to an end.

original: gang gi skra la lag pas nyug pas tshor ba med par rang 'byin zhag drug gis 'chi bar ston to ;
analyzed: gang gi skra la lag pas nyug pas tshor ba med par rang 'byin zhag drug gis 'chi bar ston to ;
translated: If his hair falls out when he touches it with his hand, and he feels no sensation, it is taught that he will die after six days.

original: / lkog ma'i nad med bzhin du zas gre ba nas mar 'gror mi 'dod pa dang / nad pa la nad g-yog sngar brtse ba yin pa la phyis brtse ba chung ba 'am /
analyzed: / lkog ma'i nad med bzhin du zas gre ba nas mar 'gror mi 'dod pa dang / nad pa la nad g-yog sngar brtse ba yin pa la phyis brtse ba chung ba 'am /
translated: If food does not descend from the throat as if there were no illness in the throat, and if he who was previously affectionate towards the sick person later shows little affection,

original: 'dor ba ltar snang na yang tshe gtugs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dor ba ltar snang na yang tshe gtugs pa yin no //
translated: or if he appears to abandon them, his life is coming to an end.

original: skyes bu gang nyin mtshan du gnyid log par byed dam /
analyzed: skyes bu gang nyin mtshan du gnyid log par byed dam /
translated: If a person sleeps day and night,

original: yang na ye med par byed na yang de ltar blta'o //
analyzed: yang na ye med par byed na yang de ltar blta'o //
translated: or if he does not sleep at all, it should be understood in the same way.

original: rgyu med par mchi ma mang po 'ong ba dang / rgyu med par rkang pa rdul pa dang mig dmar por gyur na gshin rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu med par mchi ma mang po 'ong ba dang / rgyu med par rkang pa rdul pa dang mig dmar por gyur na gshin rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If tears flow without cause, or if the feet become dusty and the eyes red without cause, he will go to the realm of the Lord of Death.

original: dngos po gang la sngon dga' ba la phyis skyo ba 'am /
analyzed: dngos po gang la sngon dga' ba la phyis skyo ba 'am /
translated: If he is disgusted with things that he previously liked,

original: zhe sdang na yang tshul gong ma ltar sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhe sdang na yang tshul gong ma ltar sbyar ro //
translated: or if he hates them, it should be applied in the same way as above.

original: skyes bu gang la rims la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid nges par tshabs che ba ltar snang la sman dpyad ma byas par zhi ba ltar byed na 'phral 'chi ba'i rtags so //
analyzed: skyes bu gang la rims la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid nges par tshabs che ba ltar snang la sman dpyad ma byas par zhi ba ltar byed na 'phral 'chi ba'i rtags so //
translated: If the characteristics of a person's fever, etc., appear to be definitely severe, but he seems to be cured without medical treatment, it is a sign of immediate death.

original: rims kyi mtshan nyid tshabs cher bying ba dang / rgyun ring du na ba dang / tshabs cher bla ba dang / 'khor ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skrangs pa dang / me'i drod nyams pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang /
analyzed: rims kyi mtshan nyid tshabs cher bying ba dang / rgyun ring du na ba dang / tshabs cher bla ba dang / 'khor ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skrangs pa dang / me'i drod nyams pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang /
translated: The characteristics of a contagious disease are: a very deep stupor, a long-lasting illness, a very high fever, a feeling of spinning, difficulty breathing, swelling, a loss of body heat, and a strong pulse.

original: tshig mi gsal ba dang / mig dmar ba dang / snying du zug pa dang / mtshan nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i rims kyang 'chi ba'i mtshan ma yin no //🔽rims nad las snga dro lud pa 'gogs su mi btub pa skam po 'byung la /
analyzed: tshig mi gsal ba dang / mig dmar ba dang / snying du zug pa dang / mtshan nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i rims kyang 'chi ba'i mtshan ma yin no // rims nad las snga dro lud pa 'gogs su mi btub pa skam po 'byung la /
translated: A contagious disease with these characteristics is also a sign of death.

original: phyi dro lud pa mchil ma can 'byung pa dang stobs dang sha zad na de yang 'chi ba'i rtags so //
analyzed: phyi dro lud pa mchil ma can 'byung pa dang stobs dang sha zad na de yang 'chi ba'i rtags so //
translated: If one spits up dry phlegm in the morning and phlegm mixed with saliva in the evening, and if one’s strength and flesh are exhausted, that is also a sign of death.

original: khrag dang mkhris pa shas cher 'khrugs pa'i khrag mdog gnag pa dang / tshon gyi mdog 'dra ba dang / dmar po dang / ser po @85b dang ; ljang gu'i mdog tu snang ba dang / pa spu'i khung bu nas khrag 'dzag pa dang / dang ga nas kha khrag mang po 'byung zhing brgyal ba dang /🔽khrag de yang shugs yang dang yang du 'byung la dri mi zhim zhing gos la 'jen pa dang / shun tu rgyas pa skya rbab dang / rims kyis btab pa dang / mtshan ma 'di dag dang ldan na srog gi dbang po 'das pa yin no //
analyzed: khrag dang mkhris pa shas cher 'khrugs pa'i khrag mdog gnag pa dang / tshon gyi mdog 'dra ba dang / dmar po dang / ser po @85b dang ; ljang gu'i mdog tu snang ba dang / pa spu'i khung bu nas khrag 'dzag pa dang / dang ga nas kha khrag mang po 'byung zhing brgyal ba dang / khrag de yang shugs yang dang yang du 'byung la dri mi zhim zhing gos la 'jen pa dang / shun tu rgyas pa skya rbab dang / rims kyis btab pa dang / mtshan ma 'di dag dang ldan na srog gi dbang po 'das pa yin no //
translated: If the blood is disturbed with a predominance of blood and bile, it appears dark red, the color of dye, red, yellow, or green, and blood oozes from the pores. If blood comes from the mouth and one faints,🔽and if that blood comes out again and again with a foul smell and stains one's clothes, and if there is severe swelling, one will not live if afflicted with these signs.

original: lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad la rims dang / skyug bro ba dang / skom dad che ba dang / 'khru ba dang / skrang ba'i brlab rnan yod na yang mi 'tsho'o //
analyzed: lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad la rims dang / skyug bro ba dang / skom dad che ba dang / 'khru ba dang / skrang ba'i brlab rnan yod na yang mi 'tsho'o //
translated: If there is phlegm, dyspnea, fever, nausea, thirst, diarrhea, and swelling, one will not live.

original: gcong chen po'i nad la rtsi ba logs g-yas g-yon du zug cing na ba dang / lto spo ba dang / khrag skyug pa dang / lus tsha ba dang bcas pa'i nad pa de ni srog gi rgyun 'gag par ston to //
analyzed: gcong chen po'i nad la rtsi ba logs g-yas g-yon du zug cing na ba dang / lto spo ba dang / khrag skyug pa dang / lus tsha ba dang bcas pa'i nad pa de ni srog gi rgyun 'gag par ston to //
translated: The patient who has a chronic illness, whose body is burning with fever, who is vomiting blood, whose stomach is swollen, and who is in pain on the right and left sides, will die.

original: skyug pa'i nad la rtag tu skyug pa dang / bshang gci'i dri bzhin du slon pa'i dri mi zhim pa dang / rma bya'i mdongs bzhin du tshon sna tshogs su skyug pa dang / de yang khrag dang / bshad pa dang / rnag dang / nad dang bcas pa dang /
analyzed: skyug pa'i nad la rtag tu skyug pa dang / bshang gci'i dri bzhin du slon pa'i dri mi zhim pa dang / rma bya'i mdongs bzhin du tshon sna tshogs su skyug pa dang / de yang khrag dang / bshad pa dang / rnag dang / nad dang bcas pa dang /
translated: The patient who is constantly vomiting, who has a foul smell like feces and urine, who vomits various colors like a peacock’s tail, and who vomits blood, bile, pus, and mucus,

original: lud pa lu ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang ldan na de ni nges par pha rol du 'pho ba'o //
analyzed: lud pa lu ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang ldan na de ni nges par pha rol du 'pho ba'o //
translated: and who has a cough and difficulty breathing, will definitely pass on to the next life.

original: skom dang che ba'i nad la sogs pa'i nad gzhan gyi rkyen gyis lus skams pa dang / lce phyir 'byin pa dang / dran pa mi gsal ba de ni tshe 'di spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: skom dang che ba'i nad la sogs pa'i nad gzhan gyi rkyen gyis lus skams pa dang / lce phyir 'byin pa dang / dran pa mi gsal ba de ni tshe 'di spangs pa yin no //
translated: The patient who has a dry mouth and tongue, whose memory is unclear, and whose body is dry due to other conditions such as thirst and fever, has abandoned this life.

original: chang nad la ni shin tu grang bas nyam thag pa dang / lus kyi sha bri ba dang / til mar gyis bskus pa 'dra na 'chi ba'i rtags so //
analyzed: chang nad la ni shin tu grang bas nyam thag pa dang / lus kyi sha bri ba dang / til mar gyis bskus pa 'dra na 'chi ba'i rtags so //
translated: In the case of a disease of alcohol, if one is extremely cold and weak, if one’s body is emaciated, and if one is smeared with sesame oil, these are signs of death.

original: gzhang 'brum gyi nad la lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / lte ba dang / bshad pa'i lam dang / 'bras bu rnams skrangs pa dang / snying dang / rtsib logs dang / yan lag rnams na ba dang / slob pa dang gzhang 'brum smin cing rims dang bcas pa ni 'chi ba'i mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: gzhang 'brum gyi nad la lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / lte ba dang / bshad pa'i lam dang / 'bras bu rnams skrangs pa dang / snying dang / rtsib logs dang / yan lag rnams na ba dang / slob pa dang gzhang 'brum smin cing rims dang bcas pa ni 'chi ba'i mtshan ma'o //
translated: In the case of hemorrhoids, if one’s hands, feet, navel, anus, and buttocks are swollen, if one’s heart, ribs, and limbs ache, and if one’s hemorrhoids are ripe and accompanied by fever, these are signs of death.

original: tshad pas 'khru ba la 'khru ba'i mdog mtsher ba'i dum bu dang 'dra ba dang / sha bskus pa'i chu 'dra ba dang / nag smug tu 'byung ba dang / til mar lta bu dang / mar lta bu dang / 'o ma lta bu dang /
analyzed: tshad pas 'khru ba la 'khru ba'i mdog mtsher ba'i dum bu dang 'dra ba dang / sha bskus pa'i chu 'dra ba dang / nag smug tu 'byung ba dang / til mar lta bu dang / mar lta bu dang / 'o ma lta bu dang /
translated: In the case of diarrhea due to fever, if the diarrhea is the color of a piece of liver, if it is the color of water in which meat has been washed, if it is blackish-brown, if it is like sesame oil, like clarified butter, like milk,

original: rkang lta bu dang / tshil lta bu dang / bu ram chu lta bu dang / glad @86a * //
analyzed: rkang lta bu dang / tshil lta bu dang / bu ram chu lta bu dang / glad @86a * //
translated: like rice gruel, like fat, like sugarcane juice, or like brain matter,

original: pa lta bu dang / snag tsha lta bu dang / dri mnam ba dang / sha btsos pa lta bu dang / sbrang rtsi lta bu dang / shin tu dmar ba dang / gnag pa dang / snum pa dang / rnag 'dra ba dang / shin du dang ba dang /🔽ska ba dang / mdog sna tshogs su 'byung ba dang / ma tshor bar rang 'byung ba dang / bshad ba mang ba dang / yang na med pa dang / kha chu lta bu dang / 'byar bag sbrang ma 'dzin pa dang / gra ma lta bu'i ri mo can dang /
analyzed: pa lta bu dang / snag tsha lta bu dang / dri mnam ba dang / sha btsos pa lta bu dang / sbrang rtsi lta bu dang / shin tu dmar ba dang / gnag pa dang / snum pa dang / rnag 'dra ba dang / shin du dang ba dang / ska ba dang / mdog sna tshogs su 'byung ba dang / ma tshor bar rang 'byung ba dang / bshad ba mang ba dang / yang na med pa dang / kha chu lta bu dang / 'byar bag sbrang ma 'dzin pa dang / gra ma lta bu'i ri mo can dang /
translated: It may be like ink, have a bad smell, be like cooked meat, be like honey, be very red, black, or oily, be like pus, or be very clear.🔽It may be pale, have various colors, come out by itself without any discomfort, be very talkative, or be absent. It may be like saliva, be sticky like a fly trap, or have lines like a saw.

original: zla ba lta bu'i thig le yod pa dang / gzhang phyir phyung ste bkas pa 'dra ba dang / rus pa dang tshigs thams cad na ba dang / bshad sgo 'dzums mi nus par gdangs pa dang / stobs zad pa dang / gzhang phyir 'byung zhing nang du zhugs pa dang /
analyzed: zla ba lta bu'i thig le yod pa dang / gzhang phyir phyung ste bkas pa 'dra ba dang / rus pa dang tshigs thams cad na ba dang / bshad sgo 'dzums mi nus par gdangs pa dang / stobs zad pa dang / gzhang phyir 'byung zhing nang du zhugs pa dang /
translated: It may have drops like the moon, be like something pulled out of the anus and chewed, cause pain in all the bones and joints, be unable to close the sphincter, be very talkative, have lost strength, come out of the anus and go back in,

original: skom dad che ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / slon pa dang / lus tsha ba dang / lto sbos pa dang / sgra dang bcas par 'byung ba dang / mtshan ma 'di dag dang ldan na nges par srog 'joms pa yin no //
analyzed: skom dad che ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / slon pa dang / lus tsha ba dang / lto sbos pa dang / sgra dang bcas par 'byung ba dang / mtshan ma 'di dag dang ldan na nges par srog 'joms pa yin no //
translated: If one has a strong desire to drink, difficulty in breathing, distension of the abdomen, fever, distension of the stomach, and rumbling sounds, then one will certainly die.

original: rde'us 'gags pa la ni rlig pa skrangs pa dang / gcin 'gag cing nad kyis nyam thag pa ni 'chi'o //
analyzed: rde'us 'gags pa la ni rlig pa skrangs pa dang / gcin 'gag cing nad kyis nyam thag pa ni 'chi'o //
translated: If the stone is obstructed, there will be swelling of the testicles, retention of urine, and suffering from the disease.

original: gcin snyi bal ni skom dad che ba dang / lus tsha ba dang / sha skrangs pa dang / 'khru ba dang / gnad rnams su tshad 'brum byung ste snying dang rgyab na ba dang / nu ma dang / phrag pa dang / bshang pa'i lam dang /
analyzed: gcin snyi bal ni skom dad che ba dang / lus tsha ba dang / sha skrangs pa dang / 'khru ba dang / gnad rnams su tshad 'brum byung ste snying dang rgyab na ba dang / nu ma dang / phrag pa dang / bshang pa'i lam dang /
translated: In diabetes, there is a strong desire to drink, fever, swelling of the flesh, diarrhea, boils in the vital points, pain in the heart and back, and boils in any of those places such as the breasts, shoulders, anus,

original: mgo bo dang / tshigs rnams dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / gnas de dag gang yang rung bar tshad 'brum 'byung ba dang / sems zhum pa dang ; 'di rnams dang bcas na srog ring po mi thub bo //
analyzed: mgo bo dang / tshigs rnams dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / gnas de dag gang yang rung bar tshad 'brum 'byung ba dang / sems zhum pa dang ; 'di rnams dang bcas na srog ring po mi thub bo //
translated: head, joints, hands, feet, and so on. If one has these along with a depressed mind, one's life will not last long.

original: me dbal kyi nad la lus thams cad la mched cing myags pa dang / rnag 'dzag cing lus tsha ba dang / skom dad che ba dang / rims kyis 'debs pa dang / tshigs thams cad rengs pa dang / skyigs bu dang ; dbugs mi bde ba dang /
analyzed: me dbal kyi nad la lus thams cad la mched cing myags pa dang / rnag 'dzag cing lus tsha ba dang / skom dad che ba dang / rims kyis 'debs pa dang / tshigs thams cad rengs pa dang / skyigs bu dang ; dbugs mi bde ba dang /
translated: In the case of a contagious fever, it is taught that death will occur if the following symptoms are present: the fever spreads throughout the body, causing it to rot and fester; pus oozes from the body; the body is hot; there is excessive thirst; there is a contagious fever; all the joints stiffen; there is vomiting; there is dyspnea;

original: glad pa 'khor ba dang / lus ngal ba de dag dang ldan na 'chi bar ston to //
analyzed: glad pa 'khor ba dang / lus ngal ba de dag dang ldan na 'chi bar ston to //
translated: the head spins; and the body is tired.

original: skran gyi nad la skran nyid tshabs cher zlum la che ba dang / rdob bzhin du sra ba dang / rus sbal gyi rgyab bzhin du phyi rlob dang / skran gyi steng du rtsa snang ba dang / @86b rims kyis 'debs pa dang / skyug pa dang /
analyzed: skran gyi nad la skran nyid tshabs cher zlum la che ba dang / rdob bzhin du sra ba dang / rus sbal gyi rgyab bzhin du phyi rlob dang / skran gyi steng du rtsa snang ba dang / @86b rims kyis 'debs pa dang / skyug pa dang /
translated: In the case of a tumor, it is taught that death will occur if the following symptoms are present: the tumor itself is large and round; it is hard like a stone; it is convex like the back of a turtle; veins appear on the tumor; there is a contagious fever; there is vomiting;🔽there is dyspnea; there is a distended stomach; it is also painful; there is phlegm; there is a cold; there is heart pain; there is dyspnea; there is diarrhea; there is swelling;

original: skyigs bu dang / lto sbo ba dang / de yang zug gzer dang bcas pa dang / lud pa lu ba dang / cham pas btab pa dang / snying na ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / 'khru ba dang / skrang ba dang /
analyzed: skyigs bu dang / lto sbo ba dang / de yang zug gzer dang bcas pa dang / lud pa lu ba dang / cham pas btab pa dang / snying na ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / 'khru ba dang / skrang ba dang /
translated: and there is a loss of appetite.

original: 'di dag dang ldan na spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag dang ldan na spang bar bya'o //
translated: If one has these, one should abandon [the patient].

original: dmu rdzing gi nad du bshang gci nang du stsogs shing phyir mi 'byung ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skrang ba dang / skyigs bu dang / rims kyis 'debs pa dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / brgyal ba dang / slon pa dang /
analyzed: dmu rdzing gi nad du bshang gci nang du stsogs shing phyir mi 'byung ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skrang ba dang / skyigs bu dang / rims kyis 'debs pa dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / brgyal ba dang / slon pa dang /
translated: [If one has] the disease of a swollen bladder, [if] feces and urine, etc. do not come out and do not go out, [if one has] difficulty breathing, [if one has] swelling, [if one has] vomiting, [if one has] a fever, [if one has] dizziness, [if one has] fainting, [if one has] indigestion,

original: 'khru ba dang / nyam chung pa dang / mig mchu skrangs pa dang / pho mtshan skrang zhing yon por 'dug pa dang / lto ba'i pags pa las chu 'dzag pa dang / bkru sman gyis bkrus na yang lto ba phyir zhing skye ba dang /
analyzed: 'khru ba dang / nyam chung pa dang / mig mchu skrangs pa dang / pho mtshan skrang zhing yon por 'dug pa dang / lto ba'i pags pa las chu 'dzag pa dang / bkru sman gyis bkrus na yang lto ba phyir zhing skye ba dang /
translated: [if one has] diarrhea, [if one has] weakness, [if one has] swelling of the eyes and lips, [if one has] swelling of the penis and it is bent, [if one has] a discharge of water from the skin of the abdomen, [if one has] a recurrence of abdominal [pain] even after being treated with purgatives,

original: mngon rtags 'di dag yod na nges par 'chi ba'i rtags so //
analyzed: mngon rtags 'di dag yod na nges par 'chi ba'i rtags so //
translated: if one has these signs, it is a sign of certain death.

original: skya rbab kyi nad la ni skrang pa dang / mig dang sen mo ser por snang ba dang / snyom pa dang / lus tsha ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / slon pa dang / brgyal ba dang / lto rgyas pa dang / 'khru ba dang /
analyzed: skya rbab kyi nad la ni skrang pa dang / mig dang sen mo ser por snang ba dang / snyom pa dang / lus tsha ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / slon pa dang / brgyal ba dang / lto rgyas pa dang / 'khru ba dang /
translated: In the case of ascites, the signs are swelling, yellow eyes and nails, lassitude, a hot body, loss of appetite, distension, fainting, a swollen belly, and diarrhea.

original: 'di rnams kyi mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i skya rbab ni 'chi ba'i rtags so //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i skya rbab ni 'chi ba'i rtags so //
translated: Ascites with these signs is a sign of death.
